branchCategory.name: 90-AFM20-40, AFM Mist Separator
branchCategory.description: <p>Series 90-AFM Modular Style Mist Separator is a cost  effective, clean looking solution to your filtration needs. The standard filtration is 0.3µm with a 95% particle size  collection rate.  The modular design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment.  90-AFM is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. Use in combination with the AF series to meet your clean room filtration requirements.</p>
